page.title: 11WINSTANLEY COLLEGE
page.content:
{STUDENTS }810-20 {TUTORS } 69 {ORIGINAL NAME }Up-Holland Grammar {FIRST FOUNDED } 1661 {FIRST SITE} School Lane {SECOND SITE } Oxhouse,Sandbrook Lne {THIRD SITE }Winstanley Rd.
The present building,now housing the Sixth-Form College, dates back to 1953.Entry then was by 11+ exam.There were 650-720 pupils on roll at the Grammar School. The present site used to be owned by the Bankes family of Winstanley Hall.It was donated by them in the 1950's.The college has had two Principals to date: H.Brian Ellis (1977-81) and Dennis Lavelle (1981-).
